name: Pound
desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg or the like.

name: Karate Chop
desc: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily

name: DoubleSlap
desc: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to four times in a row.

name: Comet Punch
desc: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to four times in a row.

name: Mega Punch
desc: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: Fire Punch
desc: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Ice Punch
desc: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: ThunderPunch
desc: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Scratch
desc: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage

name: ViceGrip
desc: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

name: Guillotine
desc: A vicious, tearing attack with pincers. The foe will faint instantly if this attack hits.

name: Swords Dance
desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

name: Cut
desc: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

name: Gust
desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

name: Wing Attack
desc: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Fly
desc: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn.

name: Bind
desc: A long body or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

name: Slam
desc: The foe is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

name: Vine Whip
desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage

name: Stomp
desc: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Double Kick
desc: The target is quickly hit twice in succession using both feet

name: Mega Kick
desc: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power

name: Rolling Kick
desc: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Sand-Attack
desc: Sand is hurled into the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

name: Headbutt
desc: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Horn Attack
desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply-pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Fury Attack
desc: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to four times in a row.

name: Horn Drill
desc: The foe is stabbed with a horn rotating like a drill. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

name: Tackle
desc: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams its target with its whole body

name: Body Slam
desc: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis

name: Wrap
desc: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for two to five turns.

name: Take Down
desc: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.

name: Double-Edge
desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

name: Tail Whip
desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing pokemon less wary and lowering their Defense stat

name: Poison Sting
desc: The user stabs the target with a  poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

name: Twineedle
desc: The user damages the target twice by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

name: Pin Missile
desc: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to four times in a row.

name: Leer
desc: The user gives opposing pokemon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

name: Bite
desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Growl
desc: The user growls in an endearing way making opposing pokemon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat

name: Sing
desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

name: Supersonic
desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Sonic Boom
desc: The is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

name: Acid
desc: The opposing Pokemon is attacked with a  spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Special Defense stat.

name: Ember
desc: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Flamethrower
desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn

name: Water Gun
desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water

name: Hydro Pump
desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Surf
desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Ice Beam
desc: The target is struck with an ice-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Psybeam
desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

name: BubbleBeam
desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

name: Aurora Beam
desc: The target is hit with a  rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Hyper Beam
desc: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

name: Peck
desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply-pointed beak or horn.

name: Drill Peck
desc: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

name: Submission
desc: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

name: Strength
desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

name: Absorb
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Mega Drain
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Razor Leaf
desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing pokemon. Critical hits land more easily

name: PoisonPowder
desc: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

name: Stun Spore
desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Sleep Powder
desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the foe.

name: String Shot
desc: The opposing Pokemon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

name: Dragon Rage
desc: This attack hits the target with a shockwave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage

name: Fire Spin
desc: The foe becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for two to five turns.

name: ThunderShock
desc: A jolt of electrisity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderbolt
desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electrisity that paralyses the target.

name: Rock Throw
desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Earthquake
desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes everything around it.

name: Fissure
desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the foe in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

name: Dig
desc: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn.

name: Confusion
desc: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

name: Psychic
desc: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Special Defense stat.

name: Hypnosis
desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

name: Meditate
desc: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its attack stat.

name: Agility
desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply increases the Speed stat.

name: Quick Attack
desc: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Screech
desc: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Double Team
desc: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

name: Harden
desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

name: Recover
desc: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Smokescreen
desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy

name: Confuse Ray
desc: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

name: Withdraw
desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat

name: Barrier
desc: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: Self-Destruct
desc: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokemon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Egg Bomb
desc: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

name: Lick
desc: The foe is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also paralyse the target.

name: Smog
desc: The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

name: Sludge
desc: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

name: Bone Club
desc: The user clubs the foe with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Fire Blast
desc: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Waterfall
desc: The user charges at the foe rapidly, and may make it flinch.

name: Clamp
desc: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user's thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

name: Swift
desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokemon. This attack never misses.

name: Spike Cannon
desc: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to four times in rapid succession.

name: Constrict
desc: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Amnesia
desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Kinesis
desc: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target's accuracy.

name: Soft-Boiled
desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

name: Glare
desc: The user intimidates the foe with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Poison Gas
desc: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the foe's face to poison the target.

name: Barrage
desc: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to four times in a row.

name: Lovely Kiss
desc: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the foe. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Bubble
desc: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Dizzy Punch
desc: The foe is hit with rhythmically-launched punches that may also leave it confused.

name: Spore
desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Flash
desc: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe's accuracy.

name: Splash
desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all…

name: Acid Armor
desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Crabhammer
desc: The foe is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Explosion
desc: The user explodes to inflict damage. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Fury Swipes
desc: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to four times in quick succession.

name: Bonemerang
desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the foe twice, coming and going.

name: Rock Slide
desc: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokemon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokemon flinch.

name: Hyper Fang
desc: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Sharpen
desc: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

name: Tri Attack
desc: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyse, burn or freeze the target.

name: Slash
desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Struggle
desc: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

name: Triple Kick
desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

name: Spider Web
desc: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

name: Flame Wheel
desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Aeroblast
desc: A vortex of air is shot at the foe to inflict damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Cotton Spore
desc: The user releases cottonlike spores that cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

name: Powder Snow
desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the target.

name: Protect
desc: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Mach Punch
desc: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

name: Scary Face
desc: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.

name: Faint Attack
desc: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

name: Sweet Kiss
desc: The user kisses the foe with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

name: Sludge Bomb
desc: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at the foe. It may also poison the target

name: Mud-Slap
desc: The user hurls mud in the foe's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Octazooka
desc: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe's face or eyes. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Zap Cannon
desc: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

name: Icy Wind
desc: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Detect
desc: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Bone Rush
desc: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

name: Sandstorm
desc: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatant types except Rock, Ground, and Steel.

name: Giga Drain
desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Charm
desc: The user charmingly stares at the foe, making it less wary. The target's Attack is sharply lowered.

name: Swagger
desc: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe's Attack stat.

name: Milk Drink
desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally's HP.

name: Spark
desc: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

name: Mean Look
desc: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Sacred Fire
desc: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: DynamicPunch
desc: The foe is punched with the user's full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

name: Megahorn
desc: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.

name: DragonBreath
desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also paralyze the target.

name: Pursuit
desc: The user runs after the foe and attacks them.

name: Sweet Scent
desc: A sweet scent that lowers the foe's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokemon if used in grass, etc.

name: Iron Tail
desc: The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat

name: Vital Throw
desc: The user allows the foe to attack first then strikes them.

name: Cross Chop
desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Twister
desc: The user whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

name: Rain Dance
desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

name: Sunny Day
desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

name: Crunch
desc: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Extreme Speed
desc: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

name: Shadow Ball
desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

name: Rock Smash
desc: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch.

name: Whirlpool
desc: The user traps the foe inside a fast, vicious whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns.

name: Heat Wave
desc: The user exhales a heated breath on the foe to attack. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Hail
desc: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokemon except the Ice type

name: Flatter
desc: Flattery is used to confuse the foe. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Will-O-Wisp
desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the foe to inflict a burn.

name: Memento
desc: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

name: Charge
desc: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Superpower
desc: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

name: Brick Break
desc: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Dive
desc: A two-turn attack. The user dives underwater on the first turn, then hits on the next turn.

name: Arm Thrust
desc: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

name: Tail Glow
desc: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, sharply raising its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Luster Purge
desc: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Mist Ball
desc: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the foe. It may also lower the target's Sp. Atk.

name: FeatherDance
desc: The user covers the foe with a mass of down that sharply lowers the Attack stat.

name: Teeter Dance
desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses all the Pokemon in battle.

name: Blaze Kick
desc: The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Needle Arm
desc: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Slack Off
desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

name: Hyper Voice
desc: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

name: Poison Fang
desc: The user bites the foe with toxic fangs. It may also leave the foe badly poisoned.

name: Crush Claw
desc: The user slashes the foe with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense.

name: Blast Burn
desc: The foe is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

name: Hydro Cannon
desc: The foe is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

name: Astonish
desc: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Fake Tears
desc: The user feigns crying to make the foe feel flustered, sharply lowering its Sp. Def stat.

name: Air Cutter
desc: The user launches razorlike wind to slash the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Overheat
desc: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat

name: Rock Tomb
desc: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It lowers the foe's Speed.

name: Metal Sound
desc: A horrible sound like scraping metal is emitted to sharply reduce the foe's Sp. Def stat.

name: Grass Whistle
desc: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the foe into a deep sleep.

name: Tickle
desc: The user tickles the foe into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Cosmic Power
desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Signal Beam
desc: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

name: Shadow Punch
desc: The user throws a punch at the foe from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

name: Extrasensory
desc: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the foe flinch.

name: Sky Uppercut
desc: The user attacks the foe with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Sand Tomb
desc: The user traps the foe inside a harshly raging sandstorm for two to five turns.

name: Muddy Water
desc: The user attacks by shooting out muddy water. It may also lower the foe's accuracy.

name: Bullet Seed
desc: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

name: Aerial Ace
desc: The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail

name: Icicle Spear
desc: The user launches sharp icicles at the foe. It strikes two to five times in a row.

name: Iron Defense
desc: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Block
desc: The user blocks the foe's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

name: Howl
desc: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

name: Dragon Claw
desc: The user slashes the foe with huge, sharp claws.

name: Frenzy Plant
desc: The foe is slammed with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Bulk Up
desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Bounce
desc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe.

name: Mud Shot
desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the foe. It also reduces the target's Speed.

name: Poison Tail
desc: An attack with a high critical-hit ratio. This tail attack may also poison the foe.

name: Volt Tackle
desc: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.

name: Magical Leaf
desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the foe. This attack will not miss.

name: Calm Mind
desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Leaf Blade
desc: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Dragon Dance
desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Rock Blast
desc: The user hurls hard rocks at the foe. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

name: Shock Wave
desc: The user strikes the foe with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

name: Water Pulse
desc: The user attacks the foe with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the foe

name: Psycho Boost
desc: The user attacks the foe at full power. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Roost
desc: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Hammer Arm
desc: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Pluck
desc: The user pecks the foe.

name: Close Combat
desc: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

name: Flare Blitz
desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

name: Force Palm
desc: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

name: Aura Sphere
desc: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

name: Rock Polish
desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat

name: Poison Jab
desc: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

name: Dark Pulse
desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Night Slash
desc: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Aqua Tail
desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Seed Bomb
desc: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

name: Air Slash
desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

name: X-Scissor
desc: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Bug Buzz
desc: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat.

name: Dragon Pulse
desc: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
desc: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Power Gem
desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Drain Punch
desc: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Vacuum Wave
desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

name: Focus Blast
desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def

name: Energy Ball
desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Brave Bird
desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

name: Earth Power
desc: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Giga Impact
desc: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: Nasty Plot
desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

name: Bullet Punch
desc: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

name: Ice Shard
desc: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

name: Shadow Claw
desc: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Thunder Fang
desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

name: Ice Fang
desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

name: Fire Fang
desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.

name: Shadow Sneak
desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

name: Mud Bomb
desc: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Psycho Cut
desc: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Zen Headbutt
desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Mirror Shot
desc: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Flash Cannon
desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe's Sp. Def stat

name: Rock Climb
desc: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

name: Draco Meteor
desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Discharge
desc: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokemon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

name: Lava Plume
desc: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokemon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

name: Leaf Storm
desc: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Power Whip
desc: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

name: Rock Wrecker
desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

name: Cross Poison
desc: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Gunk Shot
desc: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

name: Iron Head
desc: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

name: Magnet Bomb
desc: The user launches a steel bomb that sticks to the target. This attack will not miss.

name: Stone Edge
desc: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Captivate
desc: The foe is charmed into sharply lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Judgment
desc: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Bug Bite
desc: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Wood Hammer
desc: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

name: Aqua Jet
desc: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

name: Attack Order
desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Defend Order
desc: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Order
desc: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

name: Head Smash
desc: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

name: Double Hit
desc: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Roar of Time
desc: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
desc: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: Magma Storm
desc: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

name: Dark Void
desc: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

name: Seed Flare
desc: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name: Shadow Force
desc: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn.
